system.requirements:
Tier 3; Perception 45, Bulging Biceps 
Aptitudes: Perception, Offence
system.effect: When the character hits with a ranged attack, they can make a +0 Perception Test as a Reaction. If successful, they add the Degrees of Success from the Perception Test to the original Ballistic Test for the attack.
